input_text.Prompt:
Using the item features and item specification, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Item specification:
Carson Dellosa Stars and Stripes Scalloped Borders (4011)

Item features:
Includes 12 border strips measuring 3' x 3'
Border covers a total of 36 feet
Available in a variety of colors, styles, sizes, and prints to suit any classroom theme

Product description:
input_text.Response A: These decorative pop-apart borders come in a pack of twelve 3 x 3 strips for a total length of 36 feet! Whether you keep them together, layer, or pop them apart for two scalloped borders, the strips are great for framing your bulletin boards and windows or for complementing charts and class creations! Borders are available in a variety of colors, styles, sizes, and prints to suit any classroom theme!
input_text.Response B:
Transform your classroom into a patriotic paradise with the Stars and Stripes Scalloped Borders by Carson Dellosa. Including 12 border strips measuring 3' x 3', this border covers a total of 36 feet of wall space. Available in a variety of colors, styles, sizes, and prints to suit any classroom theme, this border is sure to add a stylish touch to bulletin boards, windows, walls, and more.

Attention:
Transform your classroom into a patriotic paradise with the Stars and Stripes Scalloped Borders by Carson Dellosa.

Interest:
Included in this set are 12 border strips measuring 3' x 3', which cover a total of 36 feet of wall space. Available in a variety of colors, styles, sizes, and prints to suit any classroom theme, this border is sure to add a stylish touch to bulletin boards, windows, walls, and more.

Desire:
Choose from a variety of colors and patterns to match your classroom theme and décor. These borders are a great addition to any classroom, creating a cohesive and put-together look.

Action:
Transform your classroom into a patriotic paradise with the Stars and Stripes Scalloped Borders by Carson Dellosa. Order yours today!
